data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Putrajaya. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Putrajaya, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Putrajaya, Malaysia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 65,608 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 28 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Putrajaya.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Putrajaya.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Murik Kayan people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Putrajaya, Malaysia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Putrajaya to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Putrajaya, Malaysia has a population of 68,000.

We estimate Putrajaya has 2,393 people who might know Jesus, 4,182 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 61,426 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 28 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Putrajaya, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.
